item.title: Welcome to the Blog!
item.description: Welcome to the new Arthoughts blog. Here we'll keep you updated about our Bob Ross painting workshops, general painting info and photos of my progress recreating every painting from all seasons of Bob Ross PBS show 'The Joy of Painting'.
